Name: Tantris Sidecar No.1
Ingredients: 15 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Sidecar with extra interest courtesy of Chartreuse, pineapple and Calvados.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2000 by Audrey Saunders at Beacon in New York City, USA. Sidecar history .
Nutrition: One serving of Tantris Sidecar No.1 contains 197 calories
